name: Hold Yourself
description:
You are a successful boxer. You have defeated every opponent in your matches and now you are in the final round. But the mafia is threatening you to lose the match or your girlfriend will die. They say you one thing “Don’t knockout him”, to do this you must keep the balance between bars until the end of the match.

By High Latency : Akif Akatay - Yunus Canıtez - Süha Duman
